name: Service Pup Simulator
description:
Play as a service dog guiding their owner across the road while avoiding possible distractions. Learn the dangers of distracting a dog at work through rhythm-based combat, matching each quick-time paw with the correct input. Use mouse to select and arrow keys to hit notes.

Created by:

Joseph Lyons - Programmer, Git Person

Madeline Kane - Lead Artist

Nico Siraco - Producer

 Peter McCabe - Designer

Natalie Basile - Designer

Maxim Rasnovski - Lead Sound Designer
